column1:
"content": "services:
  db:
    image: mysql
    environment:
      MYSQL_ROOT_PASSWORD: password
      MYSQL_DATABASE: petclinic
      MYSQL_USER: petclinic
      MYSQL_PASSWORD: password
    mem_limit: 1073741824
  dev-machine:
    image: eclipse/ubuntu_jdk8
    mem_limit: 2147483648
    depends_on:
      - db
"
